fields.name: Effect:
fields.value: Guess someone’s exact role (Uncertain). If you are wrong, take 1 HP Unblockable damage. If you are correct, they will have their supposed role publicly Revealed.

fields.name: Upgraded:
fields.value:
Guess someone’s exact role (Susceptible). If you are wrong, take 3 HP Unblockable damage. If you are correct, they will have their role publicly Revealed.

*This card in its normal form MAY be influenced by abilities, disguises, or statuses. You cannot apply (Reforge) to this card. You cannot guess King. This card’s effect takes place at the end of the phase.*
